name: Space Ship: The Game
description:
CONTROLS

←↑→ -  Arrow Keys(Without "Down") = Movement

Space Button = Shoot

Esc = Menu

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT: When playing don't press the menu button with mouse (menu button is on the screen top right)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created 3 years ago by me and i can't update it because the program i created itdoesn't exists anymore.
